a11y.agentsPath.markdownDescription: Custom path to the directory containing `.agent.md` files. Leave empty to auto-discover `.github/agents/` in the workspace.

a11y.defaultAgent.markdownDescription: Agent file stem used when `@a11y` is invoked without a slash command. Must match a `<name>.agent.md` file.

a11y.conformanceLevel.markdownDescription: Target WCAG conformance level. Agents will tailor their advice to this level.
